strings.otherOverviewDetail: The IFRC provides both strategic and technical support in partnerships and resource mobilization to National Societies who are working to increase their capacity. The IFRC supports National Societies in building their capacities to develop domestic fundraising portfolios. In parallel, a partnership and resource development function also provides support to the operational leadership, through engagement with partners and donors, coordination of contributions, resource mobilization efforts, and pledge management among others. IFRC also coordinates global initiatives when the IFRC is best placed to do so.
strings.rapidResponseDetail: Details about the expectations for this specialty can be found in the role profiles:
strings.otherLinkOne: Rapid Response Partnerships and Resource Development Officer role profile.
strings.otherLinkTwo: Rapid Response PRD Officer National Society Support role profile.
